text:
@realDonaldTrump @nytimes @SecAzar Your “friend” died today from COVID-19 and it’s all due to your inaction. No remorse? No sympathy for your “friend”? You’re guilty.

Stanley Chera, a New York City real estate developer and friend of President Trump, has died of complications related to Covid-19
